mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.`name` as 'cust_type_idName', c.`name` as 'department_idName', d.`name` as 'staff_idName', e.`name` as 'settlement_method_idName' from t_supplier a LEFT JOIN t_cust_type b on a.cust_type_id = b.fid LEFT JOIN t_department c on a.department_id = c.fid LEFT JOIN t_staff d on a.staff_id = d.fid LEFT JOIN t_settlement_method e on a.settlement_method_id = e.fid WHERE a.fdisable = 0 and (a.`name` like '%${str}%' or a.abb like '%${str}%' or a.`code` like '%${str}%' or a.`address` like '%${str}%' or a.`contact` like '%${str}%' or a.`phone` like '%${str}%')

select case when count(*) >=1 then 1 else 0 end from t_supplier where name = #{name}
and fid not in (#{fid})
